description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work spans various topics, including ecosystem architecture, innovation practices, and breaking down organizational silos. yeehaa advocates for an impactful and inclusive internet, emphasizing the importance of valuing differences and fostering unity. His courses and blog posts reflect a holistic approach to personal growth, startup strategies, and sustainable community building.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforming education and knowledge sharing. Founder of Offcourse and Superconnectors. Advocates for inclusive internet and effective ecosystems. Blends academia, tech, and innovation.
